name: KaKs_Calculator
publications: Zhang Z, Li J, Zhao XQ, Wang J, Wong GK, Yu J: KaKs Calculator: Calculating Ka and Ks through model selection and model averaging. Genomics Proteomics Bioinformatics 2006 , 4:259-263
description: KaKs_Calculator adopts model selection and model averaging to calculate nonsynonymous (Ka) and synonymous (Ks) substitution rates, attempting to include as many features as needed for accurately capturing evolutionary information in protein-coding sequences. In addition, several existing methods for calculating Ka and Ks are also incorporated into KaKs_Calculator.
